title: Businessweek Extra - Blackstone’s Steve Schwarzman
itunes:title: Businessweek Extra - Blackstone’s Steve Schwarzman
description:
Hosted by Carol Massar and Jason Kelly.

Featuring an in-depth conversation with Steve Schwarzman, the chairman, CEO and co-founder of Blackstone Group.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
